all_questions.question: What is one simple method of smoothing in language modeling?
all_questions.context: And the way to handle this is to... There are many methods of smoothing.

all_questions.question: How do you define the probability of a whole sentence using multiple models in backoff approach?
all_questions.context: So one of the simple ones is simply backing off to shorter n-grams.

all_questions.question: What happens if all three models (trigram, bigram, and interpolation) are used at the same time?
all_questions.context: Now with this backoff approach will be zero. So actually this is not a backoff, this is interpolation if you use all the considerations at the same time.

all_questions.question: What are some factors that determine whether backoff or interpolation is better?
all_questions.context: Sometimes interpolation is better, sometimes especially if all tension弄 Д8s each three times A5s backoff was better.

all_questions.question: What does it mean to 'resort' to using only bigrams in the backoff approach?
all_questions.context: If you use backoff the idea is that if the trigram is known you will not consider the bigrams and you resort to bigrams only if the trigram is not known.
